resources.string: Welcome to DUI. This app will estimate your Blood Alcohol Level to inform you if it is safe to drive. To do this, you will perform 3 tasks that will test your reaction time, memory and balance. Based on your performance, you will be given 1 out of 3 possible results: safe, not safe or inconclusive. Note that this is only an estimate and is not a substitute for a real breathalyzer, so please be responsible.

In this task, you will click on a target that will appear on the screen as fast as possible. You will have to do this 5 times, advancing every time you successfully hit the target. The position of the target, as well as the time it takes to appear, are generated randomly and will vary on each of the 5 times. Be aware that clicking outside of the target will negatively affect your performance.

In this task, you will be shown a series of 5 randomly generated numbers between 0 and 9, with a 1 second interval between each. The phone will vibrate to signal each character that comes up. Afterwards, you will have to input the numbers in the same order they showed up. You will do this 3 times. Your performance will be negatively affected if you make mistakes or if you take too long to input the sequence.

In this task, you will walk for 5 seconds with your phone in your hand in order to measure your balance. The phone should be placed in the palm of your hand, and your arm should be outstretched. The aim is to keep the phone as stable as possible while walking. Your performance will be negatively impacted if you do not manage to keep the phone stable. The phone will vibrate to signal the start and the end of the walking period.
